00054 const std::string TRANSLATION_OPT_GENO_DMET2_FILE = \
00055     "(DMET2: 1 of 2 experiment files) => YYYYMMDD_*_DMET[23]_Genotypes*.txt";
00056 const std::string EXCEPTION_MISSING_TRANSLATION_TABLE
00057 = "Invalid option: translation file is required (i.e. -t, --translate-file option).";
00058 
00059 const std::string EXCEPTION_MISSING_EXPERIMENT_CHP_FILE
00060 = "Invalid option: experiment CHP files is required (i.e. -e, --experiment-list option).";
00061 
00062 const std::string HAPLOTYPE_REPORT_OPTION_FIRST = "Reporting only first named haplotype among non-differentiable haplotype names in translation file.";
00063 
00064 const std::string HAPLOTYPE_REPORT_OPTION_DUPLICATE =  "Reporting a combined haplotype name based on all non-differentiable haplotype names in translation file.";

00068 /**
00069  * TranslationCommonControl::defineCommonOptions
00070  * Synopsis:
00071  *
00072  *  Define the space of possible PgOptions for command line or console. 
00073  *  
00074  *
00075  * @param opts - newly allocated PgOptions from either console or command line.
00076  *
00077  */
00078 /*****************************************************************************/
00079 void TranslationCommonControl::defineCommonOptions(TranslationEngine *engine)
00080 {
00081 
00082 
00083   APT_ERR_ASSERT(engine, "");
00084 
00085   // Program Control
00086   engine->defineOptionSection("Program Control");
00087   engine->defineOption("", "dmet2-calling", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00088                      "=> use DMET2 logic for making allele calls." , "false");
00089   engine->defineOption("", "enforce-complete-haplotypes", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00090                      "=> Enforce that experiment data has a complete set of markers for any haplotype set and abort when incomplete haplotype sets are detected." , "false");
00091   engine->defineOption("", "ignore-unknown-alleles", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00092                      "=> Ignore unknown alleles for a multi-allelic marker where the allele is not specified in the translation file. " , "false");
00093   engine->defineOption("", "ignore-report-allele", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00094                      "=> Use the alleles from the translation file for reporting and not the report allele in the annotation file. ", "false");
00095 
00096   engine->defineOption("", "audit", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00097                      "=> Audit various components of translation, don't translate.\nAvailable audit types are:\n * annotation - audit annotation file probe sets against the translation file.", "");
00098 
00099   engine->defineOption("", "use-first-dup-allele-def", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00100                      "=> If marker list filtering removes markers needed to differntiate among multiple possible haplotypes then report only the first named haplotype in the Translation file.", "false");
00101 
00102 
00103   // Input Section
00104   engine->defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00105 
00106   engine->defineOption("a", "annotation-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00107                      "=> file.csv (probe set annotation file, CSV)", "");
00108 
00109   engine->defineOption("c", "copy-dmet2-number-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00110                      "(DMET2: 2 of 2 experiment files) => YYYYMMDD_*_DMET[23]_cn_*.txt", "");
00111   engine->defineOption("e", "experiment-list", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00112                      "=> file1.chp;file2.chp;... OR file1.chp:file2.chp:..", "");
00113   engine->defineOption("E", "experiment-list-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00114                      "=> file with listing of CHP files. (Commented out lines starting with '#' are allowed).", "");
00115   engine->defineOption("B", "batch-folder", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00116                      "=> Batch folder with AxiomAnalysisSuiteData subfolder that contains genotyping data blob with call codes.", "");
00117   engine->defineOption("C", "calls-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00118                      "=> File with abstract allele calls. First column should be 'Probeset', remaining columns should be experiments. (Commented out lines starting with '#' are allowed).", "");
00119   engine->defineOption("g", "geno-dmet2-type-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00120                      TRANSLATION_OPT_GENO_DMET2_FILE, "");
00121   engine->defineOption("i", "input-dir", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00122                      "=> Directory to read input files from when file is not specified (-c, -g, -t_). The current directory is assumed when not specified." , "");
00123   engine->defineOption("m", "marker-list-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00124                      "=> marker-list-file.*.txt file is a simple list of probe sets, one per line, to be used for translation.", "");
00125   engine->defineOption("n", "genotype-override-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00126                      "=> file with genotype override base calls in TSV format." , "");
00127 
00128   engine->defineOption("s", "sample-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00129                      "=> file.txt (sample info file, TSV)" , "");
00130 
00131 
00132   engine->defineOption("t", "translate-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00133                      "=> DMET3_TTTable_vYYYYMMDD_*.txt (DMET2_TTTable_vYYYYMMDD_*.txt for DMET2 testing)", "");
00134 
00135   engine->defineOption("", "metabolizer-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00136                                          "The metabolizer bin file for translating allele calls to metabolizer genotypes", "");
00137   
00138   // Output Section
00139   engine->defineOptionSection("Output Options");
00140   engine->defineOption("b", "base-name-prefix", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00141                      "=> Base name prefix of all output reports.", "");
00142 
00143   // Reporting Section
00144   engine->defineOptionSection("Reporting Options");
00145   engine->defineOption("p", "profile", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00146                      " => Profile reporting.", "false");
00147 
00148   engine->defineOption("r", "regression", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00149                      " => Regression log level.", "0");
00150 
00151   engine->defineOption("", "marker-report", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00152                      " => Output DMET2 Marker Report.", "false");
00153 
00154   engine->defineOption("", "summary-report-sort", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00155                      "=> Sort the summary report rather than use the default translation table order.", "true");
00156 
00157   engine->defineOption("u", "uncalled-report-all-markers", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00158                      "=> Report all markers in the uncalled report, not just the uncalled markers.","false");
00159   
00160 
00161   return;
00162 
00163 }
00164 // end TranslationCommonControl::defineCommonOptions
00165 /*****************************************************************************/
00166 /*****************************************************************************/
00167 /**
00168  * Synopsis: Convert the Copy Number Report, Genotype Short Report
00169  * and Translation Tablem input files into in memory models.
00170  * Note that all the input paramaters are for return. 
00171  *
00172  * 
00173  * @param rte         - single instance run-time environment data model
00174  * @param returnMlm   - marker list single instance data model 
00175  * @param returnCnrm  - DMET2 only copy number list single instance data model
00176  * @param returnGtm   - Genotype data (CHP) single instance data model. 
00177  * @param returnTtm   - Translation table data single instance data mode.
00178  * @param returnSitm  - Sample info single instance data model.
00179  * @param returnGotm  - Genotype override single instance data model. 
00180  * 
00181  * @return true - all models where successfully allocated on the heap. 
00182  * 
00183  */
00184 /*****************************************************************************/
00185 bool TranslationCommonControl::initializeInputFileModels(RunTimeEnvironment &rte,
00186     MarkerListModel             **returnMlm,
00187     CopyNumberTableModel        **returnCnrm,
00188     GenotypeTableModel          **returnGtm,
00189     TranslationTableModel       **returnTtm,
00190     SampleInfoTableModel        **returnSitm,
00191     GenotypeOverrideTableModel  **returnGotm)
00192 {
00193 
00194   std::stringstream msgSStr;
00195   APT_ERR_ASSERT(returnCnrm && returnGtm && returnTtm, "");
00196 
00197   bool okToContinue = true;
00198 
00199   APT_ERR_ASSERT(!*returnCnrm && !*returnGtm && !*returnTtm && !*returnMlm, "");
00200 
00201 
00202   // TRANSLATION TABLE
00203   *returnTtm = new TranslationTableModel(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableType);
00204   msgSStr <<  "Input translation file records read:      " << (*returnTtm)->size() ;
00205 
00206   Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, msgSStr.str());
00207   msgSStr.str("");
00208 
00209 
00210   // COPY NUMBER, DMET2 ONLY
00211   if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_dmet2Calling) {
00212     *returnCnrm = new CopyNumberTableModel(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputCopyFile);
00213     msgSStr <<  "Input copy number records read:     " << (*returnCnrm)->size();
00214     Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, msgSStr.str());
00215   } 
00216   else {
00217     *returnCnrm = new CopyNumberTableModel();
00218   }
00219 
00220   msgSStr.str("");
00221 
00222   // MARKER LIST
00223   // Translation Table Filter.
00224   // Modify the Translation Table and filter the appropriate probe sets
00225   // and to merge the allele names for shared haplotype calls.
00226   if (*returnTtm && (! rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile.empty())) {
00227     *returnMlm = new MarkerListModel(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile);
00228   } 
00229   else if (*returnTtm && (rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputProbeSetVector.size() > 0)) {
00230     *returnMlm = new MarkerListModel(rte);
00231   }
00232   
00233   if (*returnMlm) {
00234     msgSStr << "Input marker list, probe set records read: "  << (*returnMlm)->size();
00235     Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, msgSStr.str());
00236 
00237     okToContinue = okToContinue && (*returnTtm)->probeSetFilter(rte, **returnMlm);
00238     (*returnMlm)->describeVerbose(rte);
00239   }
00240 
00241   // TRANSLATION TABLE GENE MARKER INDEX
00242   // Generate the complete list of gene markers for those operations
00243   // that require gene marker sets.
00244   // Must be done after the MARKER LIST has filtered the translation table.
00245   if ( *returnTtm ) {
00246     (*returnTtm)->generateGeneMarkerList();
00247   }
00248 
00249   msgSStr.str("");
00250 
00251   // GENOTYPE OVERRIDE FILE
00252   if (returnGotm && (!rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenotypeOverrideFile.empty())) {
00253 
00254     *returnGotm = new GenotypeOverrideTableModel(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenotypeOverrideFile, **returnTtm);
00255     msgSStr << "Input genotype override records read:      " << (*returnGotm)->size();
00256     Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, msgSStr.str());
00257   }
00258 
00259   msgSStr.str("");
00260 
00261   // GENOTYPE
00262   if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_streamType == ADT_EXPERIMENT_STREAM_TYPE_TSV) {
00263     *returnGtm = new GenotypeTableModel(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenoFile, returnGotm ? *returnGotm : NULL);
00264   } 
00265   else {
00266     *returnGtm = new GenotypeTableModel(rte, returnGotm ? *returnGotm : NULL);
00267   }
00268 
00269   // SAMPLE INFO FILE
00270   if (returnSitm && (! rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputSampleFile.empty())) {
00271 
00272     *returnSitm = new SampleInfoTableModel(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputSampleFile);
00273     msgSStr << "Input sample info records read:            " << (*returnSitm)->size();
00274     Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, msgSStr.str());
00275   } 
00276   else if (returnSitm && (rte.m_adtOpts.m_sampleTable.size() != 0)) {
00277     *returnSitm = new SampleInfoTableModel(rte);
00278     msgSStr << "Input sample info records read:            " << (*returnSitm)->size();
00279     Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, msgSStr.str());
00280   }
00281 
00282   msgSStr.str("");
00283 
00284   return okToContinue;
00285 
00286 }
00287 // end TranslationCommonControl::initializeInputFileModels

00290 /**
00291  * TranslationCommonControl::setCommonADTOptions:
00292  * Synopsis:
00293  * A quasie ADTOptions constructor. Perhaps it should be?
00294  * Copies all the passed in options to the ADTOptions single instance
00295  * object that itself is stashed in the rte. 
00296  *
00297  *
00298  * @param adtOpts - the ADTOptions to set up.
00299  * @param ptOpts  - from command line or console.
00300  *
00301  */
00302 /*****************************************************************************/
00303 void TranslationCommonControl::setCommonADTOptions(ADTOptions & adtOpts, class TranslationEngine *engine)
00304 {
00305   // Copy into our friendly ADTOptions class.
00306   adtOpts.m_progName        = engine->getProgName();
00307   int i                      = adtOpts.m_progName.rfind("/") ;
00308   adtOpts.m_progName        = adtOpts.m_progName.substr(i ? i + 1 : 0);
00309 
00310   adtOpts.m_inputDir        = engine->getOpt("input-dir");
00311 
00312   adtOpts.m_dmet2Calling    = engine->getOptBool("dmet2-calling");
00313   adtOpts.m_enforceCompleteHaplotypeGroup
00314   = engine->getOptBool("enforce-complete-haplotypes");
00315 
00316   adtOpts.m_ignoreReportAllele = engine->getOptBool("ignore-report-allele");
00317 
00318   adtOpts.m_inputAnnotationFile
00319   = engine->getOpt("annotation-file");
00320 
00321   adtOpts.m_ignoreUnknownAlleles
00322   = engine->getOptBool("ignore-unknown-alleles");
00323   adtOpts.m_useFirstDupAlleleDef
00324   = engine->getOptBool("use-first-dup-allele-def");
00325 
00326   adtOpts.m_audit            = engine->getOpt("audit");
00327 
00328   
00329   adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList = engine->getOpt("experiment-list");
00330   adtOpts.m_inputExperimentListFile = engine->getOpt("experiment-list-file");
00331   adtOpts.m_inputBatchFolder = engine->getOpt("batch-folder");
00332   adtOpts.m_inputCallsFile = engine->getOpt("calls-file");
00333 
00334   adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile = engine->getOpt("translate-file");
00335 
00336   adtOpts.m_inputTTableType = TranslationTableModel::getTranslationTableFileType(adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile);
00337 
00338   adtOpts.m_inputGenoFile   = engine->getOpt("geno-dmet2-type-file");
00339 
00340   adtOpts.m_inputCopyFile   = engine->getOpt("copy-dmet2-number-file");
00341 
00342   adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile  = engine->getOpt("marker-list-file");
00343 
00344   if (! adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile.empty()) {
00345     if (adtOpts.m_useFirstDupAlleleDef) {
00346       adtOpts.m_useFirstDupAlleleDefHeaderText =  HAPLOTYPE_REPORT_OPTION_FIRST;
00347     } else {
00348       adtOpts.m_useFirstDupAlleleDefHeaderText =  HAPLOTYPE_REPORT_OPTION_DUPLICATE;
00349     }
00350   }
00351 
00352   adtOpts.m_inputGenotypeOverrideFile
00353   = engine->getOpt("genotype-override-file");
00354 
00355   adtOpts.m_inputSampleFile    = engine->getOpt("sample-file");
00356 
00357   adtOpts.m_outputDir = engine->getOpt("out-dir").empty()?".":engine->getOpt("out-dir");
00358 
00359   adtOpts.m_logFile       = engine->getOpt("log-file");
00360 
00361   adtOpts.m_outputReportPrefix = engine->getOpt("base-name-prefix");
00362 
00363   adtOpts.m_verbosity = engine->getOptInt("verbose") ? engine->getOptInt("verbose") : 1;
00364 
00365   adtOpts.m_profile = engine->getOptBool("profile");
00366 
00367   adtOpts.m_regression = engine->getOptInt("regression") ? engine->getOptInt("regression") : 0;
00368 
00369   adtOpts.m_markerReport = engine->getOptBool("marker-report");
00370 
00371   adtOpts.m_summaryReportSort = engine->getOptBool("summary-report-sort");
00372 
00373   adtOpts.m_uncalledReportAllMarkers = engine->getOptBool("uncalled-report-all-markers");
00374   
00375 
00376   return;
00377 
00378 }
00379 // end TranslationCommonControl::setCommonADTOptions
00380 /*****************************************************************************/
00381 /*****************************************************************************/
00382 /**
00383  * _validateInputExperimentFilesFromListDMET3:
00384  * Synopsis:
00385  *
00386  * Helper function to _validateInputFilesDMET3, broken out for clarity.
00387  *
00388  * This routine reads a listing of files from a list passed in at the
00389  * command line, i.e. ( -e file1,file2,...,filen
00390  *
00391  *
00392  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts. 
00393  * @params pgOopts - command line options object
00394  *
00395  * @return - true if all input data was valid
00396  */
00397 /*****************************************************************************/
00398 static bool _validateInputExperimentFilesFromListDMET3(RunTimeEnvironment & rte, TranslationEngine* engine)
00399 {
00400 
00401   bool validOptions = true;
00402 
00403   // Create the experiment file list from a command line list.
00404   pcrecpp::RE extensionRE("(\\.chp(?:[:,]|$))",
00405                           pcrecpp::RE_Options().set_caseless(true));
00406 
00407   pcrecpp::StringPiece inputTest(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList);
00408   int numFiles = 0;
00409   std::string experimentFile;
00410 
00411   while (extensionRE.FindAndConsume(&inputTest, &experimentFile)) {
00412     numFiles++;
00413   }
00414 
00415   if ((numFiles == 0) || !(inputTest.empty())) {
00416     cerr << endl << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList << " invalid CHP experiment file name detected." << endl;
00417     validOptions  = false;
00418   } else if (numFiles == 1) {
00419     // Just one file.
00420     if (! Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList.c_str())) {
00421       cerr << endl << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList << " file not found.\n";
00422       validOptions = false;
00423     } else {
00424       rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentFiles.push_back(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList);
00425     }
00426   } else {
00427 
00428     pcrecpp::RE colonSeparatorRE("\\.chp:", pcrecpp::RE_Options().set_caseless(true));
00429     pcrecpp::RE commaSeparatorRE("\\.chp,",
00430                                  pcrecpp::RE_Options().set_caseless(true));
00431 
00432     bool isColonSeparated     = false;
00433     bool isCommaSeparated = false;
00434     std::string separator;
00435 
00436     if (colonSeparatorRE.PartialMatch(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList)) {
00437       isColonSeparated = true;
00438       separator = ':';
00439     }
00440     if (commaSeparatorRE.PartialMatch(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList)) {
00441       isCommaSeparated = true;
00442       separator = ",";
00443     }
00444 
00445     if (isColonSeparated && isCommaSeparated) {
00446       cerr << endl << "Invalid input file options: colon and comma separators cannot be mixed in the 'experiment-list'." << endl;
00447       validOptions = false;
00448     } else if (!isColonSeparated && !isCommaSeparated) {
00449       cerr << endl <<  "Invalid input file options: invalid 'experiment-list'." << endl;
00450       validOptions = false;
00451 
00452     } else if (validOptions) {
00453       pcrecpp::RE endFileRE("([^" + separator + "]+)");
00454 
00455       pcrecpp::StringPiece input(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList);
00456 
00457       while (endFileRE.FindAndConsume(&input, &experimentFile)) {
00458 
00459         if (! Fs::fileExists(experimentFile.c_str())) {
00460           validOptions = false;
00461           cerr << endl << "Invalid option: " << experimentFile << " 'experiment-list' file not found."  << endl;
00462         }
00463         rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentFiles.push_back(experimentFile);
00464 
00465       }
00466       if (!input.empty()) {
00467         cerr << endl << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList << " invalid CHP experiment file name detected. " << endl;
00468         validOptions = false;
00469       }
00470     }
00471 
00472   }
00473 
00474   return validOptions;
00475 
00476 }
00477 // end _validateInputExperimentFilesFromListDMET3
00478 /*****************************************************************************/
00479 /*****************************************************************************/
00480 /**
00481  * _validateInputExperimentFilesFromFileDMET3:
00482  * Synopsis:
00483  *
00484  * Helper function to _validateInputFilesDMET3, broken out for clarity.
00485  *
00486  * This routine reads a listing of files from a file, i.e. -E chp_files.txt.
00487  *
00488  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts. 
00489  * @param pgOopts - command line options object
00490  *
00491  * @return - true if all input files were valid.
00492  */
00493 /*****************************************************************************/
00494 bool _validateInputExperimentFilesFromFileDMET3(RunTimeEnvironment & rte, TranslationEngine * engine)
00495 {
00496 
00497 
00498   bool validOptions = true;
00499   TsvFile tsv;
00500   set<std::string> duplicateCheck;
00501 
00502   if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentListFile.c_str())) {
00503     cerr << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentListFile << " file not found."  << endl;
00504     validOptions = false;
00505   } else {
00506     ExperimentFileTableModel eftm(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentListFile);
00507 
00508     rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentFiles = eftm.m_experimentFiles;
00509     validOptions = eftm.validateFiles();
00510   }
00511 
00512   return validOptions;
00513 
00514 }
00515 // end TranslationCommonControl::_validateInputExperimentFilesFromFileDMET3
00516 /*****************************************************************************/
00517 /*****************************************************************************/
00518 /**
00519  * TranslationCommonControl::_validateInputExperimentFilesFromVectorDMET3:
00520  * Synopsis:
00521  *
00522  * See validateInputFiles, broken out for clarity.
00523  *
00524  * This routine reads a listing of files from a std::vector passed in by the
00525  * console.
00526  *
00527  *
00528  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts. 
00529  * @param pgOopts - command line options object
00530  *
00531  * @return - true if all input std::vector data was valid.
00532  */
00533 /*****************************************************************************/
00534 bool _validateInputExperimentFilesFromVectorDMET3(RunTimeEnvironment & rte, TranslationEngine* engine)
00535 {
00536 
00537 
00538   bool validOptions = true;
00539   set<std::string> duplicateCheck;
00540 
00541   pcrecpp::RE extensionRE("\\.chp$",
00542                           pcrecpp::RE_Options().set_caseless(true));
00543   std::stringstream msgSStr;
00544 
00545   std::vector< std::string > experimentFiles = engine->getOptVector("experiment-list-vector");
00546 
00547   for (int i = 0; i < experimentFiles.size(); i++) {
00548 
00549     if (!extensionRE.PartialMatch(experimentFiles[i])) {
00550       msgSStr << experimentFiles[i] << ": invalid CHP file name." << endl;
00551       validOptions = false;
00552     } else if (!  Fs::fileExists(experimentFiles[i].c_str())) {
00553       msgSStr << experimentFiles[i] << ": file not found." << endl;
00554       validOptions = false;
00555     } else {
00556       if (duplicateCheck.count(experimentFiles[i]) > 0) {
00557         cerr << experimentFiles[i] << ": duplicate file found, ignoring.\n";
00558       } else {
00559         duplicateCheck.insert(experimentFiles[i]);
00560         rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentFiles.push_back(experimentFiles[i]);
00561       }
00562     }
00563   }
00564 
00565 
00566   if (! validOptions) {
00567     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, msgSStr.str());
00568   } else if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentFiles.size() == 0) {
00569     cerr << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentListFile << " no valid CHP files found." << endl;
00570     validOptions = false;
00571   }
00572 
00573   return validOptions;
00574 
00575 }
00576 // end _validateInputExperimentFilesFromVectorDMET3
00577 /*****************************************************************************/
00578 /*****************************************************************************/
00579 /**
00580  * _validateInputFilesDMET3:
00581  * Synopsis:
00582  *
00583  * Helper function to  _validateInputFiles, broken out for clarity.
00584  *
00585  * ADDITIONAL NOTES: The list of files can be either a colon or
00586  * comma separated list. We check by looking for ".chp," or
00587  * ".chp:" in the list (when more than file exists).
00588  *
00589  *
00590  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts. 
00591  * @params pgOopts - command line options object
00592  *
00593  * @return - true if all input files were valid.
00594  */
00595 /*****************************************************************************/
00596 static bool _validateInputFilesDMET3(RunTimeEnvironment & rte, TranslationEngine *engine)
00597 {
00598 
00599   bool validOptions = true;
00600 
00601 
00602   // HACK: change this once the DMET3 table is finalized
00603   if ((rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableType == ADT_TRANSLATION_TABLE_TYPE_DMET2) &&
00604       (!rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputAnnotationFile.empty())) {
00605     cerr << "Invalid option: DMET2 translation file passed for DMET3 calling.\n";
00606     validOptions = false;
00607   }
00608 
00609   if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputAnnotationFile.empty()) {
00610     cerr << "Invalid option: annotation file is required (i.e. -a, --annotation-file option)" << endl;
00611     validOptions = false;
00612   } else if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputAnnotationFile.c_str())) {
00613     cerr << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputAnnotationFile << " probe set annotation file not found." << endl;
00614     validOptions = false;
00615   }
00616 
00617   if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile.empty()) {
00618     cerr << EXCEPTION_MISSING_TRANSLATION_TABLE << endl;
00619     rte.m_invalidOptionsMask |= ADT_INVALID_OPTION_MASK_MISSING_TRANSLATION_TABLE;
00620     validOptions = false;
00621   } else if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableType == ADT_TRANSLATION_TABLE_TYPE_INVALID) {
00622     validOptions = false;
00623     cerr << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile << ": not a DMET3 tranlsation file."  << endl;
00624   } else {
00625     if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile.c_str())) {
00626       validOptions = false;
00627       cerr << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile << ": input 'translate-file' file not found."  << endl;
00628     }
00629 
00630 
00631   }
00632 
00633   // Validate the CHP Genotype experiment files.
00634 
00635   // Add to the CHP experimet file list from a file.
00636   if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_audit.empty()) {
00637     if (engine->getOpt("experiment-list-file") != "") {
00638       validOptions = validOptions && _validateInputExperimentFilesFromFileDMET3(rte, engine);
00639     } else  if (engine->getOpt("experiment-list") != "") {
00640       validOptions = validOptions && _validateInputExperimentFilesFromListDMET3(rte, engine);
00641     } else if (engine->getOpt("experiment-list-vector") != "") {
00642       validOptions = validOptions && _validateInputExperimentFilesFromVectorDMET3(rte, engine);
00643     } else if (engine->getOpt("geno-dmet2-type-file") != "") {
00644       // Using Genotype short report style input.
00645       if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenoFile.c_str())) {
00646         validOptions = false;
00647         cerr << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenoFile << ": input genotype short report experiment file not found."  << endl;
00648       }
00649     } else  {
00650       cerr << EXCEPTION_MISSING_EXPERIMENT_CHP_FILE << endl;
00651       rte.m_invalidOptionsMask |= ADT_INVALID_OPTION_MASK_MISSING_EXPERIMENT_CHP;
00652       validOptions = false;
00653     }
00654   }
00655 
00656   return validOptions;
00657 
00658 }
00659 // end _validateInputFilesDMET3
00660 /*****************************************************************************/
00661 /*****************************************************************************/
00662 /**
00663  * _validateInputFilesDMET2:
00664  * Synopsis:
00665  *
00666  * Helper function to _validateInputFilesDMET2, broken out for clarity.
00667  *
00668  *
00669  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts. 
00670  * @params pgOopts - command line options object
00671  *
00672  * @return - true if all input files were valid.
00673  */
00674 /*****************************************************************************/
00675 static bool _validateInputFilesDMET2(RunTimeEnvironment & rte, TranslationEngine * engine)
00676 {
00677 
00678   bool validOptions = true;
00679 
00680   // INPUT DIRECTORY
00681   if (! Fs::isReadableDir(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir.c_str())) {
00682     validOptions = false;
00683     cerr << "Invalid option: directory \"" << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir + "\" input directory not found.\n" ;
00684   } else if (! Fs::isReadableDir(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir.c_str())) {
00685     validOptions = false;
00686     cerr << "Invalid option: directory " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir + "\" input directory read permission denied.\n" ;
00687   }
00688 
00689   pcrecpp::RE reCN("(?:(?:(?:^)|(?:[\\./]))\\d{8,8}_[\\d\\w]+_DMET[23]_cn_*)");
00690   pcrecpp::RE reGS("(?:(?:(?:^)|(?:[\\./]))\\d{8,8}_[\\d\\w]+_DMET[23]_Genotypes_Short_qc_*)");
00691   pcrecpp::RE reTT("((^)|([/]))DMET2_TTable_v\\d{8,8}_[^\\.]+\\.txt$");
00692   pcrecpp::RE reCurrentDirectory("\\.");
00693 
00694 
00695   std::list <std::string> searchFilesList
00696   = affymetrix_calvin_utilities::
00697     FileUtils::ListFiles(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir.c_str(), "txt");
00698 
00699   unsigned int numFoundFiles = 0;
00700   std::string *testFiles[] = { &(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputCopyFile),
00701                           &(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenoFile),
00702                           &(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile)
00703                         };
00704 
00705   const char * testOptionNames[] = { "copy-dmet2-number-file",
00706                                      "geno-dmet2-type-file",
00707                                      "translate-file",
00708                                    };
00709 
00710   pcrecpp::RE *testRegexes[] = { &reCN, &reGS, &reTT };
00711 
00712   std::list<std::string>::iterator sflIt1 = searchFilesList.begin();
00713 
00714   for (; sflIt1 != searchFilesList.end(); ++sflIt1) {
00715     for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00716       if (testFiles[i]->empty()   &&
00717           (testRegexes[i]->PartialMatch(*sflIt1))) {
00718         *(testFiles[i]) = *sflIt1 ;
00719         numFoundFiles++;
00720       }
00721     }
00722   }
00723 
00724   if ((numFoundFiles == 0) &&
00725       (engine->getOpt(testOptionNames[0]) == "") &&
00726       (engine->getOpt(testOptionNames[1]) == "") &&
00727       (engine->getOpt(testOptionNames[2]) == "") ) {
00728 
00729     if (engine->getOpt("input-dir") == "") {
00730       APT_ERR_ABORT("\nCurrent directory contains no input files.");
00731     }
00732     cerr << "Invalid option: directory \"" << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir << "\" does not contain any experiment files or the required DMET3 input files." << endl;
00733     return false;
00734   }
00735 
00736   const char *testFileTypes[] = { "input copy number",
00737                                   "geno type short report",
00738                                   "translation file",
00739                                 };
00740   const std::string TRANSLATION_OPT_COPY_DMET2_FILE =                   \
00741       "(DMET2: 2 of 2 experiment files) => YYYYMMDD_*_DMET[23]_cn_*.txt";
00742   const std::string TRANSLATION_OPT_TRANSLATE_DMET2_FILE =      \
00743       "=> DMET2_TTTable_vYYYYMMDD_*.txt";
00744 
00745   const std::string * testFileNames[] = {
00746     &TRANSLATION_OPT_COPY_DMET2_FILE,
00747     &TRANSLATION_OPT_GENO_DMET2_FILE,
00748     &TRANSLATION_OPT_TRANSLATE_DMET2_FILE,
00749   };
00750 
00751   for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00752     if (testFiles[i]->empty()) {
00753       validOptions = false;
00754       if (reCurrentDirectory.FullMatch(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir)) {
00755         cerr << "Invalid option: current directory";
00756       } else {
00757         cerr << "Invalid option: directory \"" << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir << "\"";
00758       }
00759       cerr << " is missing " << testFileTypes[i] << " file ";
00760       cerr << *testFileNames[i] << "." << endl;
00761     } else if (!  Fs::fileExists(testFiles[i]->c_str())) {
00762       validOptions = false;
00763       cerr << *testFiles[i] << ": input " << testFileTypes[i] << " file not found."  << endl;
00764     } else if ((engine->getOpt(testOptionNames[i]) == "") && !testRegexes[i]->PartialMatch(*testFiles[i])) {
00765       validOptions = false;
00766       cerr << "Invalid option: ";
00767       cerr << *testFiles[i] << ": invalid input " << testFileTypes[i];
00768       cerr << " file name, " ;
00769       cerr << "expecting " << *testFileNames[i] ;
00770       cerr << "." << endl;
00771     }
00772   }
00773 
00774   rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableType = TranslationTableModel::getTranslationTableFileType(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile);
00775 
00776   return validOptions;
00777 
00778 }
00779 // end _validateInputFilesDMET2
00780 /*****************************************************************************/
00781 /*****************************************************************************/
00782 /**
00783  * _validateInputFiles:
00784  *
00785  * Synopsis: Helper to "validateOptions", broken out for clarity.
00786  * Validate user specified input files.
00787  *
00788  * This routine accomodates:
00789  * 1.) DMET2 files for DMET2 testing.
00790  * 2.) DMET3 files for DMET3 analysis
00791  * 3.) DMET2 files for DMET3 testing.
00792  * 4.) DMET2 files for DMET3 analysis*
00793  *
00794  * *The 4th case supports end users creating text files of data they
00795  * want analyzed. The text file format will be that of DMET2. Both
00796  * the Genotype Short Report and Copy Number Report files are required
00797  * for DMET2.
00798  *
00799  * The "-g" and "-c" options are exclusive to DMET2 input and it
00800  * is an error to use them in combination with "-e".
00801  *
00802  * The "-t" option for the translation table is required for both DMET2 and
00803  * DMET3, but the table formats are different and hence a DMET2 translation
00804  * table will need modified to perform DMET3 analysis. 
00805  *
00806  *
00807  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts. 
00808  * @params pgOopts - command line options object
00809  *
00810  * @return - true if all input files were valid.
00811  */
00812 /*****************************************************************************/
00813 static bool _validateInputFiles(RunTimeEnvironment & rte, TranslationEngine *engine)
00814 {
00815 
00816   APT_ERR_ASSERT(engine, "");
00817 
00818   bool validOptions = true;
00819 
00820 
00821   // Assume the default call behavior is for DMET3. If none of the
00822   // DMET2 or DMET3 input file options are passed the
00823   // give missing DMET3 input file message.
00824 
00825   bool isDMET3Call = (!rte.m_adtOpts.m_dmet2Calling ||
00826                       (engine->getOpt("experiment-list") != "") ||
00827                       (engine->getOpt("experiment-list-file") != "") ||
00828                       (engine->getOpt("experiment-list-vector") != ""));
00829 
00830   bool isDMET2Call = (rte.m_adtOpts.m_dmet2Calling ||
00831                       (engine->getOpt("input-dir") != "") ||
00832                       (engine->getOpt("copy-dmet2-number-file") != ""));
00833 
00834   bool isBatchFolder = (engine->getOpt("batch-folder") != "");
00835   bool isCallsFile = (engine->getOpt("calls-file") != "");
00836 
00837   if (!isDMET3Call && !isDMET2Call && !isBatchFolder && !isCallsFile) {
00838     cerr << "Invalid option: an experiment list of CHP files is required." << endl;
00839     validOptions = false;
00840   } 
00841   else if (isDMET2Call && !isDMET3Call && !isBatchFolder && !isCallsFile) {
00842     validOptions = _validateInputFilesDMET2(rte, engine);
00843     rte.m_adtOpts.m_streamType = ADT_EXPERIMENT_STREAM_TYPE_TSV;
00844   } 
00845   else if (isDMET3Call && !isDMET2Call && !isBatchFolder && !isCallsFile) {
00846     validOptions = _validateInputFilesDMET3(rte, engine);
00847   } 
00848   else if ((isBatchFolder && !isCallsFile) || (!isBatchFolder && isCallsFile)) {
00849     // mutually exclusive (only one or the other is allowed)
00850     validOptions = true;
00851   } 
00852   else {
00853     cerr  << "Invalid option: use \"--dmet2-calling\" with DMET2 specific input files or the DMET2 input directory." << endl;
00854     validOptions = false;
00855   }
00856 
00857   if (engine->getOpt("batch-folder") != "") {
00858     rte.m_adtOpts.m_streamType = ADT_EXPERIMENT_STREAM_TYPE_BATCH_FOLDER;
00859   } 
00860   else if (engine->getOpt("calls-file") != "") {
00861     rte.m_adtOpts.m_streamType = ADT_EXPERIMENT_STREAM_TYPE_CALLS_FILE;
00862   } 
00863   else if (engine->getOpt("geno-dmet2-type-file") != "") {
00864     rte.m_adtOpts.m_streamType = ADT_EXPERIMENT_STREAM_TYPE_TSV;
00865   } 
00866   else {
00867     rte.m_adtOpts.m_streamType = ADT_EXPERIMENT_STREAM_TYPE_CHP;
00868   }
00869 
00870   // PROBE SET FILTER
00871 
00872   if (!rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile.empty()) {
00873     if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile.c_str())) {
00874       validOptions = false;
00875       cerr << "Invalid option: " <<  rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile << ": input marker list filter file not found."  << endl;
00876     }
00877   }
00878 
00879 
00880   // SAMPLE INFO FILE
00881   if (! rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputSampleFile.empty()) {
00882     if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputSampleFile.c_str())) {
00883       validOptions = false;
00884       cerr << "Invalid option: " <<  rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputSampleFile << ": input sample information file not found."  << endl;
00885     }
00886   }
00887 
00888   // GENOTYPE OVERRIDE FILE
00889   if (!rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenotypeOverrideFile.empty()) {
00890     if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenotypeOverrideFile.c_str())) {
00891       validOptions = false;
00892       cerr << "Invalid option: " <<  rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenotypeOverrideFile << ": input genotype override file not found."  << endl;
00893     }
00894   }
00895 
00896   return validOptions;
00897 
00898 }
00899 // end _validateInputFiles
00900 /*****************************************************************************/
00901 /*****************************************************************************/
00902 /**
00903  * TranslationCommonControl::validateCommonOptions
00904  * Synopsis:
00905  *
00906  * Validate options after they have been filled in by the call the
00907  * setCommonOptions. If any errors are detected during validation
00908  * then an exception is thrown via Err::Abort. 
00909  *
00910  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts previously set in setCommonOptions. . 
00911  * @param engine  - to be validated.
00912  *
00913  */
00914 /*****************************************************************************/
00915 void TranslationCommonControl::validateCommonOptions(RunTimeEnvironment & rte , TranslationEngine *engine)
00916 {
00917 
00918   APT_ERR_ASSERT(engine, "");
00919 
00920   bool validOptions = true;
00921 
00922   // INPUT FILES
00923   validOptions = _validateInputFiles(rte, engine);
00924 
00925   // OUTPUT DIRECTORY
00926   if (Fs::isReadableDir(rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir.c_str())) {
00927 
00928     if (!Fs::isWriteableDir(rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir)) {
00929       validOptions = false;
00930       cerr  << "Invalid option: directory \"" << rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir << "\" output directory write permission denied." << endl;
00931     } else if (!Fs::isReadableDir(rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir)) {
00932       validOptions = false;
00933       cerr << "Invalid option: directoy \"" <<  rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir << "\" output directory read permission denied." << endl;
00934     }
00935   } else {
00936 
00937     // Fs::mkdir Throws fatal exception.
00938     Fs::mkdirPath(rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir, false);
00939     Verbose::out(1, rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir + ": output directory created.\n");
00940   }
00941 
00942   if (! validOptions) {
00943 
00944     APT_ERR_ABORT(rte.m_adtOpts.m_progName + ": invalid options detected.");
00945 
00946   }
00947 
00948 }
00949 // end TranslationCommonControl::validateCommonOptions
00950 /*****************************************************************************/
